meanings.definition: A separate unit or self-contained component of a larger system.
meanings.sent1: The different modules of the toy train can be connected together.
meanings.sent2: The computer program is made up of various modules that work together.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces are like modules that fit perfectly to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each level acts as a module that must be completed before moving on.
meanings.sent5: The modules of the building blocks can be rearranged to create different structures.

meanings.definition: A standardized unit of measurement used in building construction.
meanings.sent1: The architect used specific modules to ensure accurate dimensions in the design.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers followed the set modules to build the walls of the house.
meanings.sent3: The modules for measuring length helped the carpenter cut the wood accurately.
meanings.sent4: Each brick was placed according to the modular measurements to maintain uniformity.
meanings.sent5: The modules of the ruler made it easy to measure the length of the table.

meanings.definition: A set of related courses or subjects offered as part of a curriculum.
meanings.sent1: The university offers different modules in psychology for students to choose from.
meanings.sent2: Completing all the modules in the program is necessary to obtain the certificate.
meanings.sent3: The modules on marine biology include a field trip to observe sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Each module in the course covers a specific topic to enhance learning.
meanings.sent5: Studying the modules on history helped the students understand the past events better.

meanings.definition: A detachable part of a spacecraft or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The astronaut carefully removed the damaged module from the spaceship.
meanings.sent2: The space station consists of multiple modules for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: The detachable module can be used for transporting supplies to the space station.
meanings.sent4: The module was securely attached to the rover before it landed on Mars.
meanings.sent5: The crew worked together to repair the module before the next space mission.
